phrases: Episode 8 Umaru and Christmas and New Year's
Do you think it will stick?
I was going to go to the supermarket today,
but I probably should not go out in that.
Then since I am the expert on being a shut-in,
I will plan the ideal day off for you!
You are just going to play games, right?
There is something I was planning to bring out today.
What do we need to do first, Onii-chan?
She only gets motivated at times like this.
Clean up the mess you have made.
Do not just move it all to one corner!
What would happen to her if I were not here?
I will get serious next year.
It is such a confined space, yet why does it feel like heaven?
Now that we have got the kotatsu out, I have got to bring over some stuff!
I should have bought some mandarins.
Let us go get some tomorrow.
They say it is easy to catch a cold if you let your upper body get cold...
I guess I will wake her up in an hour.
Go sleep in your own room!
It is the celebration of winter!
I am sure people will go out at night to see the the lights.
However, I will not be leaving the house at all!
Today, we will have a lazy little party, while eating cake.
I wonder when Onii-chan will be home.
What the hell is wrong with this company?!
I know how you feel, but do not say it out loud.
Let us quit this stupid company!
It is not that much, so just tough it out.
How is this not that much?!
I want to go back to how things used to be.
When we were young and free...
Hey, do not just run away from reality.
More importantly, what are you looking at during work?
Want To wear one with me, Taihei?
It is not going to come the same day you order it, you idiot.
I-I was just taking a little break...
You can quit at any time, A-f-ro.
I am sorry about this, Taihei.
I know it is Christmas and all...
Your proposal the other day was spectacular.
The higher-ups that did not pass it are shit.
Say, do you have any plans today?
Kirie-chan has not tweeted anything today...
And Ebina-chan went to visit her parents.
I wonder if she is out with her family.
I just ran into Kirie-chan over there.
You guys did not have plans together?
I-I bought a present for you, Master.
Wh-Why are you dressed as Santa, Onii-san?
Well, I went and bought one with my coworker,
and he said I might as well just wear it home.
New Year's Eve Across the Country
The year is coming to an end.
What was the most memorable part of the year for you?
Dressing up as Santa and waiting for my sister to come home.
She beat the crap out of me when she got home.
For me, that steak was really yummy.
I want to eat it again!
I want to eat ramen, too.
When Ebina-chan comes home, let us go again.
She is back in Akita right now.
Come to think of it, the first time Ebina-chan came over was this year, too.
A lot happened this year, huh?
I became friends with Kirie-chan this year, too.
Maybe I should have invited her over today.
Though, I am sure she is just being shy around me.
It is not yet time to ring the New Year's bell, but take a look.
There are already this many people in line.
I got to ring it first!
Hey, give me back my mic!
I-I hung out with Sylphyn-san a lot, too...
First Shrine Visits Around the Country
This is live footage from around the country.
Everyone is lining up, even though it is so cold.
Man, that is way too many people for the first shrine visit of the year.
What are you talking about, Onii-chan?
We have to count down in the kotatsu.
Gaki no Chikai is okay, right?
Umaru, are you going to stay up until the countdown?
I am so pumped, like I was going to see the first sunrise!
I guess it is time to get started.
Are we going to do something, Onii-chan?
What kind of way is that to start a new year?
Nothing says ringing in the New Year like drinking!
Bomber, I appreciate you preparing all of this,
but I was not going to drink this year, since Umaru is here.
Nothing says ringing in the New Year like cola!
And there is a clear one, too?!
I picked them out specifically for New Year's.
1: Cola 2: Melon Soda 3: Lemon Soda 4: Plain Soda 5: Ginger Ale
The best pairing with snacks is, of course, cola.
Though, the sweetness of melon soda
brings out the saltiness in the snacks, making it the runner-up.
Wait, I did not say anything yet!
Your beer snacks are like actual food, Bomber.
Beer snacks are not just snack foods, you know.
I have never had yakitori and potato chips together before!
The meat and potato chips are melting in my mouth...
Eating ice cream after kakinotane is delicious!
Not to mention, it is chocolate flavor.
And the textures are different, so it is great!
And then I told the section chief...
You sure we should not wake her up for the countdown?
The best thing about New Year's is that I can openly laze around.
I want to go to a world where New Year's just loops.
Do you remember what you promised me?
It was in the latter half of November.
That is a long time ago.
There is not much time left in this year, so I will do it all at once next year.
Do not do it all at once!
I will get serious starting next year!
Yeah, I did say that, but...
New Year January New Year February New Year March
The next year when I was going to get serious has actually come!
I remember it as clear as day.
You would not lie to me, would you?
However, I would like you to recall that I never specified
an actual date or place, Onii-chan.
I guess I do not have a choice...
Oh, you can clean when we get back.
Let us go for the year's first shrine visit.
Umaru, did you want to come in a kimono, too?
Let us see who has better luck!
Of course you take interest when there is a gambling aspect...
Is that better than good luck to come?
What did you wish for, Onii-chan?
It is more likely to come true if you do not say it.
Then I will not tell you, either.
I wonder what this year will be like.
I am counting on you again this year!
Wait, what are you counting on me for?
You are not going to get any more serious this year, are you?
I did indeed say I was going to get serious.
However, I never specified a date or...
She is as hot as ever.
Kanau-san's still here, even though it is Christmas Eve?
I would say she cares more about work than Christmas.
I want to go back to how things used to be.
When we were young and free...
Hey, do not just run away from reality.
More importantly, what are you looking at during work?
Want To wear one with me, Taihei?
It is not going to come the same day you order it, you idiot.
I-I was just taking a little break...
You can quit at any time, A-f-ro.
Say, do you have any plans today?
It seems like it is Christmas today for the rest of the world.
I would feel bad making you work overtime if you actually have plans.
No, I do not really have plans.
I just plan on going home, as usual.
So you are free, even though it is Christmas Eve.
And you are also here because you have nothing else to do, right?
We are the only ones here, so who cares?
No one cares, but you piss me off.
Why do not the three of us go out like old times?
I am going to have dinner with my family tonight.
You two should also go home and spend tonight with your families.
She said we could go home!
It is pretty rare for Kanau to stop by our section.
I am thinking about renting something for my sister.
I am sure she is home by herself.
Is it so rare for a lone woman to rent a DVD on Christmas Eve?
They might have Santa outfits at Village Ganvuard.
Just how much do you want to wear a Santa outfit?
FROM: Doma Taihei Attachment Merry Christmas.
Why do you have an afro, Bomber?
Let us say my afro reflects my burning soul.
So what if some hot lady said she hated afros?
